title: Ranked
body:
I just keep losing my ranked games. And ik part of it is on me at times because I do struggle with my match ups as I play qiyana but just don’t be know what to do half the time and too scared to be agressive so I just let them walk all over me, but all my other lanes do struggle as well a lot and I know the game can still be winnable but everyone just got that giving up mental.

I’m Bronze 2 but get paired with silver-gold so idk 

I just need help from people who actually know what they are doing and have been stuck where I’m at
